timeline.bodyText: True if cache management via MBean is _e_nabled.
timeline.author: vmalin

timeline.message: GG-31159 ManagementEnabled incomprehensible metric description. Corrections after the code review

timeline.bodyText:
To be honest, both versions look good to me. The original javadoc comes from JSR 107 - 12.2. MXBean Definitions. /** * Checks whether management is enabled on this cache. *

* The default value is false. * * @return true if management is enabled */ boolean isManagementEnabled(); So, it is up to you.
timeline.author: sk0x50
